page.title: 09LEISURE FACILITIES IN OTLEY.
page.content: Otley is a busy market town and a very interesting place to visit for the day. The inhabitants disagree and say that it could do with more facilities. In Burley there are many facilities eg. four pubs, and for sports there is bowls, cricket, football and tennis. In the park you can take a stroll. The town also has a library and a town hall. In Westbourne and Newall, Otley has a playground, a bowling green, two swimming pools, tennis courts and a golf club.For the young, Prince Henry's Grammar School runs some youth clubs.For old age pensioners there is a bingo hall. We did a survey in Otley and found out the favourite hobbies for men were gardening, woodwork and cycling. For women they were knitting, gardening, embroidery and reading.
